1.caption: Create
1.description: A request to create a new file on a file system.

2.caption: Read
2.description: A request to read data from a file on a file system.

3.caption: Update
3.description: A request to write data to a file on a file system.

4.caption: Delete
4.description: A request to delete a file on a file system.

5.caption: Rename
5.description: A request to rename a file on a file system.

6.caption: Set Attributes
6.description: A request to set attributes for a file on a file system.

7.caption: Set Security
7.description: A request to set security for a file on a file system.

8.caption: Get Attributes
8.description: A request to get attributes for a file on a file system.

9.caption: Get Security
9.description: A request to get security for a file on a file system.

10.caption: Encrypt
10.description: A request to encrypt a file on a file system.

11.caption: Decrypt
11.description: A request to decrypt a file on a file system.

12.caption: Mount
12.description: A request to mount a file on a file system.

13.caption: Unmount
13.description: A request to unmount a file from a file system.

14.caption: Open
14.description: A request to create a file handle.
